attributes.action: insist that the Government of Sudan immediately release Gillian Gibbons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If she is not release then the UK should expell the diplomats based in the UK and stop all aid, funding and project within Sudan

rejection.details: This petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
